name: Tales of Immunity
description:
[This game and its content were produced as part of a MSc degree in Medical Art at the University of Dundee. This game is a proof of concept demo]

Tales of Immunity is an RPG based on the immune system, its various cells, and the monsters our body fights everyday.

Play as Tomo, a young progenitor cell, as he journeys the world fighting Bacteria, Viruses, Parasites, and Fungi.
